page.title: 19LEASOWE LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: We are very lucky to have a large and modern Sports Complex,which is used by local people,and those from other areas.It comprises a 25m.pool,small training pool,large sports hall, weight training room,squash courts, and full changing facilities.We are members of the swimming,trampolining, and gymnastics clubs.The leisure centre also has a thriving section for disabled members.Some of the sports available are:{Weightlifting,table {tennis,badminton,archery,squash,tennis {gymnastics,keepfit,trampolining,5aside {football,swimming,netball,water polo, {canoeing,basketball,boxing,judo. The centre is open 7 days a week.The manager is Mr.R.Jones.Approximately 5000 people use the centre each week, of those 2000 go in the pool.The cost per year for a contract is Â£30. {(E.Wycherley/M.McDonald)
